channel.title: SimplyMoss - A bukkit plugin made by me!
channel.description:
This mod allows for the spreading of mossy cobblestone! Cobblestone can now turn into mossy cobblestone if its touching water or a mossy cobblestone block. It can spread in these directions. Up, Down, North, South, East, West, North East, North West, South East, South West.
This mod also allows you to use any hoe to clean off the mossy cobblestone and revert them back into cobblestone!
[code] Commands: growmoss
Permissions: simplymoss.growmoss (allows player or group with this permission to use the growmoss command. [/code]
This mod uses some code from the Vegetation Bukkit plugin, however I've basically rewritten everything and I plan on removing all traces of that plugin.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PMcEbXdJw0]Video[/url]
Download at [url=https://github.com/zuppers/SimplyMoss]Zupper's Github[/url]
Known bugs: Mossy Cobblestone can be invasive to water!
[code] Version change to 1.1 Changes -Attempted to fix bug where moss spreads into water -Changed the cycle player frequency -Added another configurable setting mossPass. Controls how many times to update moss in a update session default 10 [/code]
Suggestions and ideas are welcomed.

item.description:

Known bugs: Mossy Cobblestone can be invasive to water!
[/quote]

If you are still developing this, just do a quick check to make sure the block you are replacing is cobblestone before placing the mossy[/quote]It does and no I’m not.

zuppers:

Known bugs: Mossy Cobblestone can be invasive to water!

If you are still developing this, just do a quick check to make sure the block you are replacing is cobblestone before placing the mossy

item.title: SimplyMoss - A bukkit plugin made by me!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I never fixed a few bugs, or I didn’t publish them. And no I haven’t checked for compatibility with the current versions of bukkit. This WAS suppose to be a feature added to Minecraft so I figured it would have been out by now.

Read full topic

item.title: SimplyMoss - A bukkit plugin made by me!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

This mod allows for the spreading of mossy cobblestone! Cobblestone can now turn into mossy cobblestone if its touching water or a mossy cobblestone block. It can spread in these directions. Up, Down, North, South, East, West, North East, North West, South East, South West.

This mod also allows you to use any hoe to clean off the mossy cobblestone and revert them back into cobblestone!

Commands: growmoss

Permissions: simplymoss.growmoss (allows player or group with this permission to use the growmoss command.

This mod uses some code from the Vegetation Bukkit plugin, however I’ve basically rewritten everything and I plan on removing all traces of that plugin.

Video

Download at Zupper’s Github

Known bugs: Mossy Cobblestone can be invasive to water!

Version change to 1.1
Changes
 -Attempted to fix bug where moss spreads into water
 -Changed the cycle player frequency
 -Added another configurable setting mossPass. Controls how many times to update moss in a update session default 10

Suggestions and ideas are welcomed.

Read full topic
